## isEmpty variable

Returns `true` if the given value is its type's empty value; otherwise `false`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isEmpty: (val: unknown) => val is Empty
```

## Remarks

The definition of Empty - `''` - `{}` - `[]`

## Example


```ts
isEmpty('') // true
isEmpty({}) // true
isEmpty([]) // true

isEmpty('hello world') // false
isEmpty(1000) // false

```
